sec.p:
The impact of changes in land use, land management, and precipitation patterns were examined for the continental United States at the HUC8 watershed scale. Analogously to an earlier study
41 , the analysis included all HUC8 catchments except for ten that are predominately made up of water, yielding a total of 2105 HUC8 watersheds. The HUC8 watershed boundaries were obtained from the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) Watershed Boundary Dataset (WBD).
